title: NESA's Workshop in Chechnya
body:
The NESA conducted a surgical workshop in Grozny and Gudermes, Chechnya from December 13-16 with NESA members from Germany, Israel, Russia and Turkey. In each city, live surgeries were performed. 

 The workshop was well attended by 700 participants and was opened with the participation of the Chechen Health Minister. 

 The workshop was followed in the local and Russian television networks. Following this workshop, the NESA has already been invited for future workshops in other Republics and in Moscow
